title: Undisconnected from chat and can´t  connect back
body:
I was going to play a game with my friend , but when i start to search a game , i disconnected from the chat and i can´t manally reconect , i ask you for help 
Thank you {{item:3070}}

replies.body: Same problem here. don't know if its only in EUNE or not.

We've picked up on this issue and are providing updates on our [service status ](http://status.leagueoflegends.com/#eune)site.  Some players are having trouble connecting to chat, and after investigation a fix is now in the works.  We'll get you guys back and chatting with your friends!
same here. I've tried everything. It didn't help me shit.
yeah looks like eune only, i hate it.  Me and my gf want to play and we cant play together..

maybe this is a sign we should quit lol?
...
......
........
nah.
